nodes.text: The Anoat sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. It included multiple worlds such as Bespin, Burnin Konn, and Hoth. In the days following the Battle of Endor, the sector was blockaded by Governor Ubrik Adelhard's faction, a remnant of the Galactic Empire. A number of cults and secret societies that promoted warfare and bloodshed pervaded the darker parts of the sector. The area was valuable to the Empire thanks to the tibanna gas generated and refined on the gas giant Bespin. Due to the scarcity of fuel reserves, the planet's Chinook Station was a critical asset for the Imperials. If it was sabotaged, then Imperial forces everywhere would run out of gas. As a result, a blockade guarded the installation from attack. However, Agents Iden Versio and Del Meeko later used a stealth incursion to attack the facility, and the former Imperials were successful in destroying the flying refueling station with a cloud car.
